name: Running Tackle
summary: You charge toward your opponent, throwing your body at them in a vicious tackle.
description:
You charge toward your opponent, throwing your body at them in a vicious tackle. Stride up to your Speed and then make an unarmed melee Strike. If you hit, you can attempt to Shove the target.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.

Open: These maneuvers work only as the first salvo on your turn. You can use an open only if you haven't used an action with the attack or open trait yet this turn.
